title: What are the basics we have to learn for VLSI? - Quora

response.answer_text: Well, according to me DIGITAL ELECTRONICS IS THE HEART ELEMENT AND AS WELL AS BASIC ELEMENT FOR VLSI. If u want to excel good amount of knowledge in vlsi you should be perfect in digital electronics. digital design (i.e., digital electronics with circuit designing concepts) is the heart and core part. if you are perfect in this and also with this if you have some good programming basics (i.e., minimal knowledge on ‘C’ language, not mandatory but still if u have) then its a good start for you to be in vlsi. Hope it helps……….
